hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Umama:Whenever the dining sheet of the Prophet (ﷺ) was taken away (i.e., whenever he finished his meal), he used to say: "Al-hamdu li l-lah kathiran taiyiban mubarakan fihi ghaira makfiy wala muWada` wala mustaghna'anhu Rabbuna

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا فَرَغَ مِنْ طَعَامِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What one should say after finishing one's meal.
